text: "Bringin' On the Heartbreak" is a 1981 song by English heavy metal Def Leppard. It was taken from their second studio album High 'n' Dry. The remix version went to number 61 in the United States in 1984. ==Mariah Carey version== "Bringin' On the Heartbreak" was covered by Mariah Carey in 2003. It was taken from her ninth studio album Charmbracet. It was a top thirty hit in Switzerland. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Def Leppard songs Category:Mariah Carey songs
title: Bringin' On the Heartbreak
